courseSectionInformation: No graduate credit. 9 professional hours. Prerequisite: VM 607 and good standing in the veterinary professional curriculum, or consent of instructor.
description: Pathology, clinical pathology, and imaging of organ systems; epidemiology and food safety; and includes an integrative laboratory covering commonly encountered problems in infectious diseases. No graduate credit. 9 professional hours. Prerequisite: VM 607 and good standing in the veterinary professional curriculum, or consent of instructor.
label: Pathobiology III
